Best Auto Darkening Welding Helmet – Top Picks & Reviews

June 9, 2021February 8, 2021 by Brayden
1.8k
SHARES
ShareTweet

If you are a welder by job or your work includes welding, An auto-darkening welding helmet is your first need. This is very important for a person who has to weld metals in his work because safety is the priority for every single person.

When you weld any metal, sparks will come out up to your face and neck therefore wearing welding helmet is very important for your safety. The main features of the best auto-darkening helmets are that it must cover your whole face and neck. If the weight of the auto-darkening helmet is less and the quality is good then you will enjoy your work and feel comfortable.

The lens quality is a very important factor in choosing the right auto-darkening helmet because the lens plays a very important role to avoid any type of damage to your eyes. Therefore when you buy any welding helmet you must check that how much ultraviolet/infrared radiations are stopped or their impact is reduced to a safe limit.

Here the top 10 Best auto darkening welding helmet reviews for you. Here you can choose the best for you from these products.

Also Read: Best Welding Helmets Reviews & Buying Guide

List of 10 Best Auto Darkening Welding Helmets

After forty hours of continuous research on different auto darkening welding helmet products and their brands also, finally, we’ve picked up the list of top 10 auto darkening welding helmets. These helmets are lightweight, cheap, ability of auto obscuring, comes with true color technology, having the large viewing capability, and also provides UV/IR Protection.

Best overall

Antra AH6-260-0000

Specifications:

  • Viewing Size: 3.86X1.73″
  • Shade Range: 4/5-9/9-13
  • True Color Lens: Blue Light Reduction
  • Weight: Very Light 16.5OZ
  • Product Dimensions: 9 x 9 x 12 inches
  • Viewing Area: 98mm x 44mm / 3.86″ x1.73″
  • Cartridge Size: 110mm x 90mm x 9mm / 4.33″ x 3.54″ x 0.35″
  • Optical Class: 1/1/1/2
  • Reaction Time: 0.00004(1/25,000) Seconds
  • Dark to Light: 0.1-1 Seconds
Check On Amazon

Antra AH6-260 is a very good welding helmet in its class because it has many useful features. It is one of the best antra auto darkening welding helmet. It is a lightweight helmet and also very useful in different types of cutting, grinding and welding operations.

It is fully automatic in its operation and has a knob to adjust its sensitivity. If you are looking for Solar-powered auto-darkening welding helmet this is for you because it has solar cells in it.

It is the best helmet at a low price due to its large number of features. It is a versatile helmet that can be used for TIG, MIG, MMA, plasma and arc welding.

It is very lightweight you can use it for a long time as compared to others. One thing is also in the mind of the user that its screen is not too big as some others.

The lens of this auto darkening helmet is restricted to supply only 9-10 shade. within the low light, you simply can see the brilliant arc he added.

The main feature of this helmet is the advanced technology used in the lens. It uses 4C lens technology so, it is called the best lens auto darkening welding helmet. It has a widescreen view and very good optical clarity. It included the best auto darkening lens in it.

Lincoln electric Viking 3350 auto darkening helmet has a solar source as a power supply and  4 sensors in it and very adjustable according to the needs of the users. It comes with a helmet bag, bandana, 5 outside cover lenses, 2 inside cover lenses and a sticker sheet.

It is designed in such a way that it can be used in all types of environments and it can be used for different types of welding and grinding operations.

FAQ’s

If you are looking for the best quality welding helmet then I suggest you go for the Lincoln Electric Viking 3350. Although its rate is high because it uses advanced lens technology for your eyes protection and all other features in it are also very impressive.

Usually, cheap helmets are safe but sometimes they also show unusual behavior in working therefore, if are looking to buy cheap welding helmets you must go through their pros and cons and also read their reviews by the users so you can decide the cheap best rated auto darkening welding helmet for your work.

First you should complete research about the welding helmets, check their features, pros, cons and their reviews so you can get a clear idea about the factors that must be in your mind to select an auto darkening welding helmet.

Normally it works for 1-2 years without any problem. Mostly you have to change the battery after one or two years because it uses Lithium-Ion batteries that will last 1 to 2 years then you should replace it, sometimes you have also other issues in the helmet but they seldom come.

The top-rated auto darkening welding helmet in the market are most of the Lincoln Electric company. They have high rates as compared to others but they are getting the best reviews in the industry. Yeswelder, Hobart, Antra and Jackson are also big names in the best auto darkening welding helmets.

if your head is bent forward that is a possibility. you can overcome that by positioning or by putting something over your head, preferably something that doesn’t ignite easily. or use your head and come up with something. It is not a football helmet. That would get pretty hot unless you are somewhere cold.

Conclusion

It is very hard to give a verdict because there are many factors which should be in mind to decide, which product is the best for the buyers. If you are looking for the quality of the auto dimming welding helmet then I suggest you go for the Lincoln Electric Viking 3350. Although it is expensive, but it is the best auto darkening welding helmet for the money.

If you are looking for cheap but good quality welding helmets then I prefer Antra AH6-260-0000 to othersbecause it is very good in features and quality in such a price range. The most important feature is that it is a solar powered helmet.

Yeswelder, Hobart and Jackson are also big names and good auto darkening welding helmet companies.
